thread.title: Nintex is one of the 100 Fastest-Growing Private Companies in Washington State
thread.title_full: Nintex is one of the 100 Fastest-Growing Private Companies in Washington State

author: admin
title: Nintex is one of the 100 Fastest-Growing Private Companies in Washington State
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/9/2015 @ 7:00 AM   Nintex 
BELLEVUE, Wash., Oct. 9, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Nintex today announced that the company has been recognized by the Puget Sound Business Journal (PSBJ) as one of the 100 Fastest-Growing Private Companies in Washington for 2015. 
https://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20151007/275186 
"Sustainable growth is part of our DNA," said Nintex CEO John Burton . "Being one of Washington state's fastest-growing privately held companies is a testament to the power of our workflow and document generation technologies. More than 6,000 companies are improving business efficiency by automating how works get done thanks to the support of our robust global partner network and the scalability of the Nintex platform." 
Nintex made the 2015 PSBJ list based on its revenue growth over the last three calendar years, 2012-2014. The company employs more than 300 people worldwide who are located across offices including: Bellevue, Dubai, Irvine, Kuala Lumpur, London, Melbourne, Hong Kong, Singapore, and Tokyo. For a complete list of job opportunities at Nintex, please visit https://careers.nintex.com/ . 
Nintex's easy-to-deploy technology which integrates with the world's largest enterprise services platforms, including SharePoint, Office 365, and Salesforce, as well as its collaborative workplace in Bellevue, have been recognized by third-party organizations throughout 2015. Notable awards include: -- 2015 Microsoft Office and SharePoint Application Development Partner of the Year Award -- 2015 Office App Awards -- Nintex claimed the "People's Choice" top honor for Overall Developer and 1(st) place for "Most Launched SharePoint Add-in" and "Most Business Value SharePoint Add-in" for Nintex Workflow for Office 365 plus two 2(nd) place awards, including "Best Mobile App" & "Highest Performing SharePoint Add-in" -- 2015 Seattle Business magazine's 100 Best Companies to Work For -- 2015 Puget Sound Business Journal Eastside Fastest-Growing Private Companies -- 2015 Seattle Business magazine's Tech Impact Award -- 2015 DocuSign's DTM Award for Newcomer/Rising Star Partner Media Contacts Kristin Treat Erica O'Connor Nintex Public Relations Weber Shandwick for Nintex kristin.treat@nintex.com nintex@webershandwick.com cell: (215) 317-9091 
About Nintex Nintex, the maker of award-winning business productivity software and SaaS offerings, enables enterprise IT professionals and business analysts to more easily create and manage simple to sophisticated business processes from the back to front-office. From automating workflows and forms, to document generation, the Nintex Workflow Automation platform leverages the world's largest technology ecosystems including Office 365, Salesforce, SharePoint, and other enterprise services platforms. With the support and integration of Nintex's platform within these systems, companies of all sizes are able to drive greater productivity across departments and mobile devices, while enhancing end-user satisfaction with a more efficient way to get work done. The success of this technology has resulted in Nintex serving more than 6,000 customers in more than 90 countries through its growing global network of more than 1,200 partners. Learn more at www.nintex.com . 
Product or service names mentioned herein may be the trademarks of their respective owners.
